definition: (sports) the act of touching a player in a game (which changes their status in the game), provide with a name or nickname
details:
noun
- (sports) the act of touching a player in a game (which changes their status in the game)
- a game in which one child chases the others
- a small piece of cloth or paper
= synonyms: rag, shred, tag end, tatter
- a label written or printed on paper, cardboard, or plastic that is attached to something to indicate its owner, nature, price, etc.
= synonyms: ticket
- a label associated with something for the purpose of identification
= example: a label associated with something for the purpose of identification
verb
- provide with a name or nickname
- attach a tag or label to
= synonyms: mark
- touch a player while he is holding the ball
- supply (blank verse or prose) with rhymes
- go after with the intent to catch
= synonyms: chase, track, dog, tail, trail, go after, chase after, give chase
